Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: String of planets raided by Marik militia forces [[DM.Factions[faction_MarikA6],6th Marik Militia]] has raided Duchy of Andurien [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Shiro],Shiro III]] and [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Palladaine],Palladaine]] planets while 2nd Marik Militia raided into Steiner owned [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_SecondTry],Second Try]] planet. In others news, counter to expectations, FWL struggles to win in the battle against rebels in [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Kujari],Kujari]] and [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Wallacia],Wallacia]].

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Military experts claim that the raiding of Andurien planets has two fold objectives – attack on enemy moral and logistics but also information gathering on capabilities of the wayward provincial military forces. Raid into Second Try is bit harder to fathom, since provoking Steiner-Davion alliance can seem on surface to be counterproductive for FWL, seeing its internal troubles and Andurian Crises they have to deal with. As to FWL troubles in Kujari and Wallacia, the Second Oriente Hussars’ troubles started when they on their landing on Kujari met fierce opposition from mercenaries local authorities had hired - [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBlackWidow],Natasha Kerensky's]] Black Widow Battalion. Through next few days much of FWL forces would be whittled down in series of hit and run attacks, finally being forced from Kujari with Black Widow taking the fight to Wallacia. This has been the CNB September broadcast.
